name: Ancestral
storyline:
In a world where the occult and the unknown intertwine, you take on the role of Miguel, a dedicated member of a Masonic fraternity, determined to unravel the mysteries surrounding the disappearance of his brothers. The investigation leads him to an imposing Masonic residence, where dark and disturbing secrets lurk around every corner, and a Masonic temple awaits macabre revelations.

The plot revolves around a sacred amulet, brought from Egypt after an excavation carried out by members of the fraternity. What initially seemed to be an archaeological relic of incalculable value, quickly transforms into an object of pure terror, with powers that transcend human comprehension.

As he explores the residence and the hidden temple in its depths, Miguel must face supernatural phenomena, cryptic clues and unspeakable horrors. With the fate of his brothers at stake, he discovers that the amulet may hold the key to a mystery that dates back to ancient civilizations and interdimensional forces beyond our reality.

Prepare yourself for a journey of psychological terror, investigation and occultism, where every choice can be crucial and the secrets of the past can exact a terrible price.
summary: Play as Miguel, a member of a Masonic fraternity, as you investigate the disappearance of your brothers in a mysterious residence. Uncover the secrets brought from Egypt, deal with supernatural forces and interdimensional horrors. Discover what really happened and face the unknown.
